TextJPN: ＜C.古手一家の世界＞の『C2 女王の母の不信』の出現条件を教えるわね。
TextENG: I'll teach you the unlock condition for ``C2 Distrust of the Mother of a Queen`` in the World of the Furude Family.

TextJPN: ＜B.昭和５５年の世界＞の『B2 Ｈ１７０』@r＜B.昭和５５年の世界＞の『B6 白川公園転落事故』@r…以上のカケラを見た後、選択できるようになるわよ。
TextENG: ``B2 H170`` in the World of 1980@r``B6 An Accident at the Shirakawa Park`` in the World of 1980@r...After viewing the above pieces, you will be able to select this one.

TextJPN: そして、@r＜C.古手一家の世界＞の『C5 三番目の「検体」』@r＜A.鷹野三四の世界＞の『A3 一二三四』@r…以上のカケラの出現に関わってくるわよ。
TextENG: Also, ``Third 'Specimen'`` in the World of the Furude Family@rand ``A3 One, Two, Three, Four`` in the World of Miyo Takano@r...These additional fragments will be involved in their unlocking.
